title: Bug 16445Import External Project should only ask for location
description: 0519(related to bug 14317)The import external project should not for the project name.The project name is in the project description, so we have an answer. Ifsomeone wanted to rename a project, they could do so, but this feels like anadvanced operation, not the normal operation (and there is already support torename explicitly for the advanced case).I believe the current UI is here, because the core API did not initiallysupport creating a project from a project description.This limitation hasbeen addressed (bug 14317).There is a description of a corner case when importing an external project intothe workspace default location.This will require additional testing.Therequirement is that projects in the workspace default location are wellnamed(project name = simple name of project location)
EB: Bug 16445Import External Project should only ask for location
